              [". Could also be "],
              ["os.RDWR", [["c"]]],
              [" if we also to both read and write * "],

              [" means that if file exists, weâ€™ll append * "],

                " means that if file doesnâ€™t exist, weâ€™ll create it. Without this flag opening non-existing file would fail"
